weekly_top5.name: The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation

target.bear_case_note: Break below rising short-term trend (loss of MA10/MA20 support) or market-wide risk-off in financials; catalyst fades if tokenized deposit newsflow stalls or is viewed as immaterial.

primary_catalyst.title: BNY tokenized deposits / on-chain settlement pilot newsflow
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Multiple independent reports describe BNY rolling out/tokenized deposits and partnering with Ripple/Circle for faster institutional settlement—potentially a narrative catalyst for digital-asset infrastructure exposure and incremental fee opportunities.

sources.title: BNY Rolls Out Tokenized Deposits for Near Real-Time Institutional Settlement
World's largest custodial bank BNY to offer tokenized deposits for institutional investors
Bank of New York Taps Ripple and Circle for Faster Institutional Settlement

risk_factors: Narrative catalyst risk: tokenized deposit pilot may be perceived as incremental/PR rather than near-term earnings driver.
Financials factor risk: rates/CPI/Fed commentary can dominate stock moves regardless of company-specific news.

weekly_top5.name: Delta Air Lines, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: If earnings timing is later than the 7-trading-day window or guidance disappoints; also invalidated by sharp oil spike or broad travel/consumer risk-off.

primary_catalyst.title: Delta earnings on deck + analyst double-upgrade newsflow
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Multiple headlines flag Delta earnings as imminent ('on deck') and note analyst actions; earnings is a high-impact catalyst that can drive >10% moves in airlines when guidance surprises.

sources.title: Airline Scores Breakout, Receives Double Upgrade. Delta Earnings On Deck.
Dow Jones Futures: It's A Broad, Strong Rally, Do Your Stocks Reflect That? JPMorgan, Goldman, Delta, Taiwan Semi Loom
Delta, Southwest, FedEx, Marriott: Top Analyst Calls

risk_factors: Binary event risk if earnings occurs within the window: guidance sensitivity can cause large gap moves both directions.
Macro/commodity risk: jet fuel (oil) and demand signals can overwhelm company-specific positives.

weekly_top5.name: BridgeBio Pharma, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: If the anticipated Phase 3 readout timing slips beyond the window or expectations are already priced; biotech risk-off can compress multiples quickly.

primary_catalyst.title: PROPEL 3 'Last Visit' set; Phase 3 readout approaching
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Company-specific clinical-trial milestone headline indicates the Phase 3 program is nearing readout; biotech names can move >10% on incremental trial timing/expectations shifts.

risk_factors: Biotech binary risk: trial/readout expectations can reverse sharply on any negative nuance or delay.
High realized volatility: position sizing and gap risk are material.

weekly_top5.name: Dollar General Corporation

target.bear_case_note: If the guidance-hike/upgrade impulse is already priced and follow-through buying fades; also vulnerable to broad retail rotation.

primary_catalyst.title: Post-guidance hike analyst upgrades / top-ideas inclusion newsflow
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Headlines cite a profit outlook hike and fresh analyst upgrades; continued follow-through from upgrades/top-ideas lists can extend momentum over a 1–2 week window.

sources.title: Dollar General (DG) Is Up 8.5% After Profit Outlook Hike And Analyst Upgrades Has The Bull Case Changed?

risk_factors: Already-moved risk: headline notes DG up 8.5% after outlook hike; incremental upside may be harder if positioning is crowded.
Defensive retail can underperform in strong risk-on tape; factor rotation risk.
